Ansar Howara Sporting Club  (}}) is a Lebanese football club based in Houara, Lebanon, that competes in the .
History
Founded in 1988, the club gained promotion to the Lebanese Second Division in 2019. They were relegated back to the Lebanese Third Division, after finishing last in the 2020â€“21 season.
